text: Pedro Alejandro Paterno y de Vera-Ignacio,García Castellón, Manuel. also spelled Pedro Alejandro Paterno y Debera Ignacio (February 17, 1857 – April 26, 1911), 993 pages was a Filipino independence activist, revolutionary and politician. He was also a poet and novelist. He was the second Prime Minister of the Philippines provisional revolutionary government from May 7, 1899 to November 13, 1899. ==References== == Other websites == * Pedro Paterno's Proclamation of War on June 2, 1899 * Ninay Category:1857 births Category:1911 deaths Category:Filipino autobiographers Category:Filipino journalists Category:Filipino poets Category:Asian novelists Category:Politicians from Manila Category:Writers from Manila Category:Prime ministers of the Philippines
title: Pedro Paterno
